docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: AFTER ALL THE HOOPLA, THIS IS A winter of discontent with trendy food. No matter the months past, filled, as they were, with purple potatoes and white eggplants, goat cheese and grazing, a salad called mesclun and a fish called skate, South-western cafes, French bistros, Italian trattorias and restaurants as elaborately designed as M-G-M stage sets.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: IN THE ROLE-REVERSAL WORLD OF Louise Page's ''Real Estate,'' men become enthusiastic house-husbands, fathers willfully assert their own sense of paternal responsibility. At the same time, women, advancing their individualism and seeking fulfillment, isolate themselves from the needs of others. With compassionate equanimity, Ms.

headline.main: HER DRAMAS PONDER THE PRICE OF LIBERATION

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: For decades they were obscure researchers toiling in the social science vineyard: the demographers, gerontologists and other scholars who studied the nation's aging population. Often their work was met with benign neglect.
